description:
Meesho: Online Shopping App
Shop from our quality products across fashion, home essentials, beauty, and more — all at affordable prices on the Meesho app. Whether you're refreshing your wardrobe or upgrading your home, Meesho makes online shopping simple, affordable, and fun. 

Why Shop on Meesho 
1. Quality Products at Affordable  Prices Discover fashion, home & kitchen, kids & baby care, beauty & personal care products — all at prices that fit your budget. 
2. Free Delivery on Every Order Enjoy free shipping with no minimum order value. 
3. Cash On Delivery (COD) Available Pay only when you receive your products.
4. Easy Returns and Refunds 7-day free returns with refund policy — no questions asked. 
5. Safe & Secure Payments Your online transactions are protected with trusted payment gateways and encrypted security.
 
How to Shop on Meesho 
Download the App and explore trending products. 
Add to Cart and choose from our trusted sellers.
Select Payment Method — COD or secure online payment.
Get Fast, Free Delivery right to your doorstep. 

Want to Start Selling Too?
Meesho also empowers individuals and small businesses to grow online. Easily list your products, manage orders, and reach millions of customers across India — all from the same app. Whether you shop or sell, Meesho helps you save more and earn more — your all-in-one destination for online shopping in India.

With Instamart, get instant delivery of groceries in 10 minutes!* Order Groceries, Vegetables, Dairy, Kitchen essentials, Electronics, Beauty products, Home decor, Milk delivery etc. right to your door. Shop from over 30,000+ products from the best grocery shopping app.

- High-quality groceries, fruits and vegetable delivery
- Amul Milk, curd, bread, butter, eggs, cheese, paneer etc. on groceries delivery app
- Ferrero Rocher Chocolates, Pringles chips, Karachi Bakery biscuits, Cadbury chocolates
- Soft drinks, Bisleri water, snacks, ice, ice cream etc via instant grocery
- Atta, rice, pulses, cooking oil, spices, noodles & more groceries
- Personal care products, detergents, cleaning supplies
- Baby care, diapers, baby food essentials & other groceries
- Pet food, pet necessities & more on 10 minutes delivery app
- Everyday electronics like chargers, bulbs, batteries
- Kitchen gadgets like choppers, blenders, grinders
- Puja supplies along with groceries at best grocery store app
- Stationery items for work & school
- Cool gadgets like smartwatches, headphones, LED lights
- Emergency supplies like torches, first aid, band-aids

Freshest Fruits and Vegetables
Get the freshest groceries to your doorstep with Instamart, the quick grocery delivery app. Order vegetables online & get tomatoes, avocado, apples, fruits & household items through our 10 minutes delivery app. Also get essentials like milk online delivery to your home for added comfort.

Many Safe Payment Options + Cash on Delivery Too!
Instamart, a grocery shopping app delivery for your everyday needs. Pay securely for groceries and other products with UPI, Cash on delivery, or cards / wallets / netbanking / LazyPay. We accept Sodexo meal pass too.

Low Prices Groceries Delivery, Amazing Offers 24x7
This instant delivery app brings discounts, savings, deals & bank offers on groceries with fast delivery. Enjoy Monthly Mega Saving Festival–get up to 60% off during the first week of every month on the best grocery shopping app.

Puja Needs & Groceries Delivery
Get puja essentials like flowers, oil, agarbatti, and other groceries delivery in just a few clicks. Open Instamart to get instant grocery & enjoy shopping online.

Festive Essentials in a Flash with Fast Delivery
From decorations, to balloons, party supplies & so much more for your events & festivals like Rakhi, Diwali, Holi, & more. 

Perfect Gifts via Grocery Store Delivery App
Get instant delivery & find a gift for any occasion with Instamart, the best instant delivery app & grocery app.

Electronics Store with Fast Delivery
Wired or bluetooth earphones? Smart watches & LED lights? Shop for electronics via Instamart, the finest grocery store delivery app.

Now Delivering in 120+ Cities
Bengaluru, Chennai, Delhi, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Kolkata, Mumbai, Noida, Pune, Ahmedabad, Central Goa, Chandigarh, Coimbatore, Dehradun, Faridabad, Indore, Jaipur, Kochi, Lucknow, Mysore, Surat, Thiruvananthapuram, Vadodara, Vijayawada, Vizag, Bhubaneswar, Kozhikode, Nagpur, Nashik, Pondicherry, Mangaluru, Guntur, Bhopal, Thrissur, Varanasi, Rajkot, Ludhiana, Warangal, Kanpur, Udaipur, Amritsar, Salem, Ranchi, Tirupati , Trichy, Manipal, Vellore, Allahabad, Kollam, Khammam, Hubli, Gorakhpur, Belgaum, Sonipat, Kottayam, Agra, Patiala, Kurnool, Ambala, Karimnagar, Panipat, Nellore, Aligarh, Gwalior, Shivamogga, Vapi, Jalandhar, Alappuzha, Sri Ganganagar, Tirupur, Erode, Madurai, Bareilly, Kota, Ujjain, Aurangabad, Roorkee, Kakinada, Mathura, Patna, Meerut, Moradabad, Palakkad, Thoothukudi, Tirunelveli, Raipur, Jamshedpur, Jabalpur, Kanchipuram, Jodhpur, Bathinda, Thanjavur, Siliguri, Thiruvalla, Vizianagaram, Cuttack, Anand, Latur, Nagercoil, Dibrugarh, Rudrapur, Ajmer, Guwahati, Karnal, Tumakuru, Jhansi, Amravati, Kolhapur, Rajahmundry, Rohtak, Bhilai, Kurukshetra, Davanagere, Karaikkudi, Karur, Berhampur, Durgapur, Bikaner, Satara, Ahmednagar , Saharanpur, Nanded, Lonavala, Silchar, Bilaspur

Nykaa Fashion Online Shopping App is your go-to online shopping app in India to get your hands on the latest luxury collections. Your one-stop destination to luxurious shopping, Nykaa Fashion App offers you curated clothing and accessories collections!
With the Nykaa online fashion shopping app, discover the most iconic brands online. Enjoy the ease of being able to browse and buy from anywhere at any point in time with the Nykaa shopping app. Get products delivered at your doorstep, shop from our made-to-order range and get apparels made exclusively for you, enjoy easy exchange and return policy for many styles online, get notified for seasonal promotions, sales and surprise discounts on designer apparels, all at Nykaa Fashion online store.

Nykaa Fashion Online Shopping App offers:-
With 250+ renowned and emerging brands across clothing apparels, jewellery, footwear, lingerie, etc. Nykaa Fashion online shopping app offers you a curated edit of your favourite styles in contemporary and ethnic fashion that are 100% authentic and are directly scoured from the brands!

Ethnic wear collections
Come indulge in a variety of ethnic wear collections at Nykaa Fashion, the best ethnic wear shopping app for women. From wedding lehengas to sarees, kurtas to dresses, gowns to salwars sets to trousers and palazzo pants, you can find it all at our online fashion store. Trust us when it comes to designer ethnic collections for women online shopping apps as we are one of the best online shopping apps in India.

Contemporary wear collections
When you shop at Nykaa Fashion, one of the best clothing apps, you never have to crib about low varieties and same old stuff at overpriced rates. Get the best of women’s fashion online, by Label Ritu Kumar, AND, Global Desi, Alaya by Stage3, AM:PM, Varun Bahl and many more only at Nykaa Fashion App. And what’s even more exciting is that you can get these collections at amazing prices, while the offers and sales seasons go live on Nykaa Fashion, the best shopping app for IOS.

Jewellery collections
From ethnic jewellery to fashion jewellery, you can now surf it all effortlessly with the Nykaa Fashion app, the best online jewellery shopping app in India. With fresh collections being updated every week on the app, get your hands on the latest designer jewellery pieces from brands like Tribe by Amrapali, Misho, Pipa Bella, SIA, Studio Kassa, Zohra, and many more at Nykaa Fashion.

Footwear collection
The best ladies footwear app online, Nykaa Fashion brings your both ethnic as well as contemporary footwear collections varying across different styles and trends. Discover a variety of collections from brands like Colaba Causeway, INOCHHI, OCEEDEE, ZTOES, Vareli Bafna and many more.

Handbags collection
Come and explore from the varied range of handbags collection with the Nykaa Fashion online shopping app. Choose across 500+ products from brands like Adora by Ankita, Baggit, Caprese, Eske Paris, ESBEDA, Hidesign, Inai, and many more.

App Features:
 • Choose from our curated edit of over 250+ designers and brands for your favourite style in contemporary and ethnic fashion.
 • Keep yourself updated in the world of fashion with Nykaa Fashion app PUSH NOTIFICATIONS.
 • Save the items that you loved the most to your own Wishlist collection. Simply tap the HEART ICON.
 • Easy exchange and return policy at Nykaa Fashion for many styles.
 • Enjoy flat 10% off on your first order with the Nykaa Fashion app.
 • Browse through Style Files – Nykaa Fashion blog, to know more about the latest trends in fashion. Specially curated styling tips by our experts, Style Files gives you a deeper insight on what’s in vogue now. From celeb styles to how-to files, you can find it all here at the Nykaa Fashion blog.

Make this online shopping app your go-to app to get your hands on the best and the latest designer collections. Download Nykaa Fashion online shopping app today to enjoy many of its benefits!

About the App:
Flipkart brings you the thrill of discovery with a treasure trove of products—mobiles, fashion, electronics, home appliances, groceries, and more. It's your one-stop shop with amazing discounts, SuperCoins on every purchase, fun rewards, and timely deal alerts. A new addition is Flipkart Minutes, where you get everything you need delivered in just 10 minutes! All wrapped in one app built for your ultimate convenience. Explore it all in your language.
Flipkart Minutes: Forgot to grab the groceries? Need a last-minute gift? Prepping for a party? Or just realized you’re out of your favorite snacks? Flipkart Minutes delivers everything you need & want in just 10 minutes! From the freshest fruits & veggies to the latest gadgets daily essentials & more—we've got it all at UNBEATABLE prices.
Spoyl: The ultimate Gen-Z fashion hub. Expect fresh drops, LIT trends, and genderless styles that let you be unapologetically you. Spoyl yourself and be the trendsetter in your squad!
Grocery: Skip the queue, save on fuel, and get groceries delivered to your doorstep. Just remember, it’s better to order a day in advance—not when you’re mid-chutney and missing a chilli! Living life by the minute isn’t scalable.
Personal loans: Get flexible EMIs, affordable rates, and a seamless experience that makes loan approvals easier and faster than ever.
Vibes: Turn online shopping into an experience that feels as real as being in the store, all from the comfort of your couch.
Easy on the eyes, easier to navigate—our new design puts everything you need right where you want it.
Group Buy: Shop together, save together. Because sharing is caring!
Brand Mall: Love the mall but prefer your living room? Explore our premium brands collection without leaving your couch.
Tailor-made recommendations and trending stores, designed to get even better when you’re logged in. Give it a try and let us know how we did!
A regional language experience that feels like home, no matter where you are.
Faster than ever before—our engineers have outdone themselves this time.
Update the app and discover how we’ve crafted something for everyone, with you at the heart of it all.
 
_________________________________
 
*Note on Personal Loans*
 
Scapic Innovations Pvt Ltd (SuperMoney) is a Flipkart Group financial technology company. Scapic Innovations Pvt Ltd only provides a platform to facilitate money lending by Regulated Entities viz. registered Non-Banking Financial Companies (NBFCs) or Banks to users and is acting as an Loan Service Provider in partnership with Axis Bank & IDFC Bank. 
Loan tenures offered by the lenders vary from 6 months up to 72 months. The rates start from 10.5% and may go up to 33%. Loan amount ranges from Rs 5000 up to Rs 10L. Interest rates and loan amounts are determined by the lenders basis customer profile and not Scapic or Flipkart. 
Sample working is shown below
 
Representative Example:
Loan Amount
Rs 102008
Processing Fee (Including 18% GST)
Rs 2407
Stamp Duty
Rs 20
Net Disbursal Amount
Rs 99581
Interest Rate
20.50%
Monthly EMI
Rs 6631
Loan Period
18 months
First Emi date
10/12/2023*
Last Emi date
10/05/2025*
*Subject to change based on disbursal date
 
Maximum Annual Percentage Rate (APR) :  33%
Interest rates available on the platform are provided by the lending partner (NBFC or Bank) that is approving the loan. The rates vary depending on the customer profile based on credit score and other factors, as per lenders.
 
Privacy Policy
https://www.flipkart.com/pages/scapic-privacy-policy
Scapic T&C
https://www.flipkart.com/pages/scapic-tnc
 
Partner Links:
https://www.idfcfirstbank.com/personal-banking/adlp/digital-lending-partners/scapic-innovations
https://www.axisbank.com/retail/loans/personal-loan/personal-loan-lsp

If you have more ideas on how we can solve for India or find a bug you’d like to bring to our attention, drop a note to app-feedback@flipkart.com.

Nykaa is the trendiest go-to online beauty app & wellness destination for men & women. Purchase from over 1 Lakh beauty products & 850+ brands. Buy products that are 100% genuine & reliable, sourced directly from the brands. 
Get the latest collection of products for men & women through luxury, wellness, makeup, natural skin care, hair care, herbal, perfumes, bath & body, mom & baby products.
Buy cosmetics online at the best prices & avail discounts with India’s leading beauty shopping app. 
Makeup products: Get the best make-up products online at low prices. Browse through our makeup store app to shop for your favorite lipsticks, mascaras, lip glosses, eyeliners, foundations, etc. You can also buy a makeup kit of your favourite brand from our latest collection. 
Skin care: Buy creams, moisturizers, face masks, lip balms, etc., from our online Skin store. We have a number of sun protection, skin lightening & pigmentation products available.
Hair Care: Shop hair care products for women online. Break-up with split ends, hair fall, dandruff, frizzy/dry hair with our wide variety of shampoos, conditioners, hair oils & creams available in top brands @ Nykaa Hair Care Store.  
Natural: Check out some of the best organic beauty products available online at our natural make up & skin care store.
Fragrance: Premium perfumes & colognes for men & women from top brands such as Jimmy Choo, Davidoff, Calvin Klein, Bvlgari, etc.
Nails: Buy Nail polish, art kits, manicure & pedicure kits from one of India’s best shopping apps online.
Glam & Fit: Shop comfy lingerie from our fancy collection of bras, underwear & swimwear
Bath & Body: Get the coolest bath & body products for daily use from brands such as The Body Shop, Nivea, Pond’s, Vaseline, etc.
Accessories: Grab the best deals on Handbags, jewelry, sunglasses & more.
Appliances: Order beauty appliances such as air straighteners, blow dryers, men’s beard trimmers, & more at best prices. 
Men’s Store: Shaving creams, beard trimmers, hair care, wellness & gift offers for men
Nykaa Luxe: Shop the latest in makeup, skincare, haircare, fragrances, bath & body from our luxury brands. 
Shopping at Nykaa is fun. Satisfy every woman’s shopping needs with our makeup shopping app.
Follow What’s Trending - Shop the latest makeup products, cosmetic products, natural hair products, with our beauty trends. Buy from our collection of sunglasses, handbags & jewellery. 
Nykaa Network: Contact beauty experts to get the perfect look for any occasion & follow what’s in trend with Nykaa Network. 
With our ‘Refer A Friend’ program, you can invite friends to join the Nykaa community. Once you refer a friend, you earn Rs. 200 for every friend who registers & completes their first order at Nykaa.com. Your friends also win Rs.200 on their first purchase of online shopping with us! 
Women’s shopping is now made more worthwhile with our exclusive shopping deals and discounts on brands like Maybelline, Lakme, L’Oreal Paris, Nykaa Cosmetics, M.A.C, & other beauty products. 
Visit Nykaa beauty store for a great shopping experience, the virtual makeover tool, free expert advice & articles on beauty trends, tutorials & celebrity looks. Select from options of paying via Cash on Delivery, Mobile Wallet, UPI, Debit Card, Credit Card & Net Banking processed through secure gateways. You can also buy gift cards for your loved ones. 
Nykaa Affiliate Program: Partner with us, share reviews about your favorite offering from Nykaa & earn money when someone purchases from us using your affiliate link.
Download India’s most loved makeup app & boost your online shopping experience with makeup tutorial videos, beauty tips for women, beauty advice from style divas.
Have any questions or issues related to Nykaa beauty app? Reach out to us at support@nykaa.com. Call us on 9222201010.

Swipe, select & shop! It’s a fashion store on the go with the Myntra Mobile App. Shop for clothing, footwear, accessories and home furnishing for men, women and kids. Get all your favourite fashion brands and collections at the click of a button.


Guaranteed 100% original products, hassle-free returns or exchanges, secure payments, EMI options. Also get great sign-up benefits and free shipping on your first order.

Browse through 5 Lakh + products from 2500 brands instantly on the Myntra shopping app. Explore the latest trends in lifestyle and shop from the biggest clothing store for Kurtis, Sarees, Shoes, T-shirts, Jackets, Jeans, Bags, Skirts, Dresses, Jewellery, Watches, Wallets, Footwear, Home Furnishing and much more.

The online collection of products includes

•Men's shopping -  Watches, suits, shoes, T-shirts, shirts, trousers, gym wear, backpacks, wallets, sunglasses, casual shoes, sneakers, smartwatches, headphones, sports shoes from brands like Puma, Adidas, Nike, Reebok, Casio, Levis, Pepe, Fastrack, Hugo Boss, Raymonds, Wills Lifestyle, John Players, WROGN, HRX, Roadster, Flying Machine, Fossil, Red Tape & more

• Women's shopping - Sarees, anarkalis, dresses, lingerie, party wear, watches, shrugs, jumpsuit, kurtis, tops, heels, sandals, sneakers, handbags,  accessories, jewellery, lipsticks, make-up, personal care & more. Shop from top brands like Forever 21, All About You, MANGO, Only, AND, W, Biba, Next, Vero Moda, Roadster, Esprit, Dressberry, Libas, AKS, Catwalk, Inc 5, Lavie, Hidesign, Michael Kors, Daniel Klein & more

• Kid's shopping – Girl’s tops,  girl’s sandals, girl’s leggings, girl’s dresses, girl’s footwear, girl’s accessories, boy’s T-shirts, boy’s shorts, boy’s trousers, boy’s shirts, boy’s footwear, kid’s bags, kid’s winterwear. Shop from top brands like Gini & Jony, United Colors of Benetton, U.S. Polo Assn. Kids, Mothercare, Mini Club, adidas, Allen Solly Junior, Lilliput, Next, Puma, The Children’s Place


• Home Furnishing - Bedsheets, cushion covers, blankets, towels, curtains, pillow covers, bath rugs & home décor. Shop from brands like Swayam, Spaces, Raymonds, & Portico New York.

APP FEATURES

•Find products you love: Choose from a vast collection of over 5 Lakhs styles for men, women, teens & kids on our online clothing store

•Refine your search based on popularity, discount, prices, colours, sizes & more using sort & filter features

•Avail massive discounts: Get products at their best prices with integrated Myntra coupon codes in your account.  Get notifications on best deals & offers

•Fast & secure checkout: Pay by cash-on-delivery, net banking or choose credit/ debit card options

•View detailed product information with rich images & style notes from our fashion editors

•Log-in seamlessly using Facebook & Google

•Promise of timely delivery backed by an extensive delivery network

•Wishlist collections: Save styles for later by adding to your wishlist straight from the app

•Sharing made easy: Get style suggestions from your friends by sharing on WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter, & email

•Refer your friends & get huge benefits

•Keep Active with Myntra Move: Get rewarded for tracking your steps on Myntra Move. The steps are tracked using your phone's Apple Health app.

The Amazon India - Shop and Pay App brings to you a wide selection of products across categories at great prices. Use Amazon Pay for instant checkout on your purchases, hassle-free payments, faster refunds, easy bill payment, mobile & DTH recharges, flight booking & instant money transfer from your bank account. Shop for your everyday grocery, personal care & household needs with Amazon Pantry & enjoy quick delivery along with great cashbacks. Download the Amazon India- Shop and Pay App for free from Apple App Store and enjoy online shopping and payments at your fingertips!

Great Shopping Experience
The free online shopping app from Amazon assures you of a great shopping experience with a lighter app, faster load time & wide selection across categories. You can browse and search for your desired products by product name, category or brands. Get personalized recommendations based on ratings & shopping trends.

With Amazon India, you are guaranteed 24x7 customer service support, faster delivery, easy returns, & convenient payment options including cash on delivery with 100% purchase protection offered by Amazon’s A-to-Z Guarantee.

Track your Orders
Shopping on the Amazon app offers you up to the minute updates on the status of your orders & you can choose to track it anytime through the ‘Your Orders’ menu option.

Faster & safer payments with Amazon Pay UPI
Pay directly from bank account for online shopping, recharges, bill payments, flight bookings or transfer money using Amazon Pay UPI. It is UPI PIN secure and supported by govt. of India

Instant money transfers
Bank-to-bank money transfers to anyone in your contact book or a UPI ID, even if they don’t have the Amazon app. Pay at your nearby stores by scanning any UPI QR.

Fast & Easy Recharges & Bill payments
Recharge your prepaid mobile for major operators: Airtel, Jio, Vodafone, Idea, BSNL, MTNL. Recharge your DTH with all major service providers: Tata Sky, Dish TV, Airtel DTH, Reliance digital TV. Pay your electricity, postpaid, landline, broadband, gas & water bills.

Amazon miniTV
Amazon miniTV is a free video streaming service offering original web series, short films, comedy videos & more. It’s a one-stop destination for unlimited entertainment with content curated for Indian customers.
· Create your watchlist
· Easily continue watching where you last left off
· Free video with minimum ads
· Stream exclusive web series & watch miniMovies

Book Domestic Flights on Amazon
Book your travel tickets seamlessly by using your existing contact details and payment information. Enjoy low cancellation fees with no extra cancellation penalty.

Unbeatable savings on Amazon Pantry
Shop for your monthly grocery & household needs from Amazon Pantry and get unbeatable savings. Avail up to 35% off on top-quality brands & up to 15% cashback when you buy more. Enjoy benefit of 1-day & scheduled delivery

Safe and Secure Shopping
Shop using your Amazon Pay balance, Credit/Debit Card, UPI, EMI or Net Banking knowing that all transactions are securely processed. No need to worry about your personal or account details getting leaked, as Amazon.in provides you 100% purchase protection for safe payments & transactions. You could also pay cash on delivery for your orders.

Make the most of Amazon’s exclusive benefits
Become an Amazon Prime member & get guaranteed free 1-Day, 2-Day or standard delivery on eligible items, 30-minute early access to top Lightning deals & watch the latest & exclusive movies and TV shows on Prime Video.

By using this app, you agree to Amazon’s Conditions of Use (www.amazon.in/conditionsofuse) and Privacy Notice (www.amazon.in/privacy).

If your device supports TrueDepth technology, the app will use your device camera to detect your facial movements only while using certain features such as virtually try-on products like sunglasses. All information processed using this technology remains on your device.

In a nutshell, we deliver everything you need in 10 minutes. Across India. 24 hours. 7 days a week. 

Get up to ₹100 off on your first Zepto order, as a gift from us. 

So, what all can Zepto deliver in 10 minutes? Glad you asked. 

Short answer: Everything. 
Long answer 

Groceries for dinner. And a cooker to make your special biryani. 
We deliver both in 10 minutes 

Need headphones for a meeting. And a coffee to focus. 
We deliver both in 10 minutes 

Dumbbels for the gains and ice packs for the strains 
We deliver both in 10 minutes 

When we say “everything”, we mean it! 

We deliver everything from Eno to Uno, clocks to locks, matchsticks to lipsticks, blades to shades, dates to plates, lighters to highlighters, tea bags to t-shirts, butter to cutters, rice to spice and peas to cheese 

From iPhones & tablets to headphones & speakers for quick tech upgrades.
From curtains to ferry lights to set the vibe. 
From the perfect footwear to the right eye shadow for your outfit. 
From chart paper & school bags to the latest toys for your kids. 
From breakfast essentials & dry fruits to fresh meat for meals that fill you with nutrition. 
From sanitary pads to sexual wellness products & haircare to skincare for taking good care of yourself. 

You get the drift. Over 2,00,000 products from top brands at the lowest prices all over India. Delivered to your doorstep in just 10 minutes. 

You can look around but you won’t find prices lower than Zepto Super Saver. It’s a challenge. 

Want some tea? Say hello to Zepto Café 

Ever felt like having a snack but cooking feels like too much effort? Need a coffee in the office but you have another call scheduled for 10 minutes? Unannounced guests coming over?

For all these situations (and many more) – You can now worry less and trust Zepto Café to deliver fresh food in just 10 minutes. 

From coco to momo, from upma to pakora, from idli to bhelpuri, from pavs to baos, from dal makhani to Hyderabadi biryani, from margherita to shahi tukda, and from cakes to shakes 

Café delivers over 2000 dishes and drinks to your doorstep in just 10 minutes 

All the speed, 0 compromises 

Everything that reaches your doorstep – from fresh fruits, leafy vegetables to dairy, bread and groceries – goes through multiple quality checks. Only those products that pass these checks are delivered to you! 


Where can you use Zepto 

Agra, Ahmedabad, Alwar, Ambala, Amritsar, Anand, Bareilly, Belgavi, Bengaluru, Bhiwadi, Chandigarh, Chatrapati Sambhaji Nagar, Chennai, Coimbatore, Dehradun, Delhi, Devangere, Faridabad, Ghaziabad, Gorakhpur, Gurugram, Haridwar, Hisar, Hubballi, Hyderabad, Indore, Jaipur, Jalandhar, Kanpur, Kochi, Kolkata, Kota, Kurukshetra, Lucknow, Ludhiana, Madurai, Meerut, Mehsana, Mumbai, Mysuru, Nagpur, Nashik, Neemrana, Noida, Palakkad, Panchkula, Panipat, Prayagraj, Pune, Rajkot, Roorkee, Saharanpur, SAS Nagar, Sonipat, Surat, Thrissur, Tiruchirappalli, Tumkuru, Udaipur, Vadodara, Valsad, Varanasi, Vellore, Vijayawada, and Warangal.

If we aren’t delivering in your area yet, don’t worry. We are adding new locations every day and will start delivering in your area super soon. 

What’s coming next? Everything 

From just groceries to getting a new phone in your hands in just 10 minutes – we’ve come a long way! 

Every day, we are adding new categories of products in cities across India so Indians can spend less time worrying about things and more time doing things they love.


We are excited for you to join the 30 cr+ users who have installed the app and are enjoying the magic of Zepto’s 10 minute delivery 

*Terms and Conditions Apply. Visit Zepto Platform Terms of Use for detailed terms

Nykaa Man: Style, Grooming, Fitness, and Everything in Between! 

Nykaa Man is here - India’s only platform for men’s grooming, fashion, luxury, fitness & more! Shop 100% authentic products from top international & domestic brands, all in one place. Score the best deals and prices on your favorite products!
Whether you’re looking to upgrade your skincare routine, discover the latest fashion trends, or find the perfect scent, Nykaa Man has everything for you.

Why Shop at Nykaa Man? 
- A Platform Dedicated To Men’s fashion & grooming needs 
- 100% Genuine Products from trusted brands 
- Top International Brands available 
- Easy Returns if you change your mind 
- Secure Checkout for a safe shopping experience 
- Exclusive Offers & Deals you’ll love! 
- Personalized Recommendations just for you!

Exclusive Offers Just for You! 
- Get FLAT ₹400 off on your first order*
- Get an Additional ₹200 Off* on your second order 
- Get FLAT ₹100 off* on your third orders
- Grab unbelievable discounts in our Weekly & Monthly Sales

- Skincare: Face washes, moisturizers, sunscreens, serums, scrubs, masks, lip care from brands like The Ordinary, Minimalist, CeraVe, Neutrogena, Dot & Key, Plum, COSRX, Bioderma, and The Derma Co. 
- Hair Care: Shampoos, conditioners, hair oils, serums, masks, styling creams, gels, waxes, sprays from L'Oreal Professionnel, Moroccanoil, Olaplex, Beardo, Sebamed etc
- Fragrances: Eau de toilettes, eau de parfums, colognes, body sprays, deodorants from Rabanne, Tom Ford, Versace, Jean Paul Gaultier, Azzaro, Skinn by Titan, Davidoff and more. 
- Bath & Body: Body washes, scrubs, soaps, lotions, moisturizers, talcs, deodorants, massage oils, hand creams, foot care from Bath & Body Works, The Body Shop, MCaffeine, Bombay Shaving Company, Gillette, and Man Matters. 
- Grooming Gadgets: Trimmers, shavers, razors, clippers, hair dryers, stylers, grooming kits from Dyson, Philips, Ustraa, Beardo. 
- Footwear: Casual shoes, formal shoes, sneakers, sports shoes, boots, loafers, sandals, flip flops from New Balance, Adidas, Puma, Reebok, Asics, Red Tape, The Souled Store, Off Duty India. 
- Accessories: Sunglasses, belts, wallets, bags, backpacks, watches, smartwatches, ties, cufflinks, pocket squares from Ray-Ban, Tommy Hilfiger, Titan, Fastrack, Coach, Maserati, Fossil, Armani Exchange, Casio, Timex.

Save the items you love the most in your own list of favourites — just tap the HEART ICON. 

Turn the H&M app into your own shopping tool — activate IN-STORE MODE when you visit one of our stores. See which of your favourite-marked items are available in the store you’re in, or nearby.

Keep up to date with the fashion world by activating PUSH NOTIFICATIONS! You’ll be the first to know when a designer collection drops and you’ll instantly be notified when we have special offers and events!

Buy Effortlessly, Every Time

Through expert curation and deep industry insight, TATA CLiQ Fashion brings this vision to life - championing makers, materials, and stories that truly matter. 

 

Experience Innovation

Get Inspired

Selling Your Old Mobile Phone
Cashify simplifies the process of selling your used mobile phone, providing instant payments and competitive pricing. Here's a step-by-step guide on how to sell your old phone:
Download the Cashify App: Open the app and navigate to the "Sell" section.
Provide Device Details: Select your phone's model, colour, and describe its condition, noting any scratches or dents for an accurate quote.
AI Price Evaluation: Cashify’s AI-based price calculator generates an instant price based on your device's condition.
Schedule Free Pickup: Enter your address and preferred pickup time, with no extra charges involved.
Instant Payment: After your device is picked up, receive your payment immediately via your preferred method, including UPI, bank transfer, or gift cards.
Benefits of Selling with Cashify

Selling old phone on Cashify is a seamless process. Not only is it quick, but you also get the best buyback value for your old phone.
